summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3754 for the improvement of West Spokane Street from Chelan Street to Iowa Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading, paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46236, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
